questions.question: This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' journey to rescue Sanji from a political marriage, involving a battle against the Big Mom Pirates. What is...?
This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' separation and subsequent two-year hiatus, as well as the introduction of the Eleven Supernovas. What is...?
Set on an island dominated by a tyrannical Warlord, this arc introduces the character Law and features the Straw Hats battling against Caesar Clown. What is...?
This ability, often used by Monkey D. Luffy, drastically increases his speed and power, and changes his skin to a reddish color. What is...?
This technique, used by Brook, allows him to extract and manipulate the souls of others. What is...?
This technique, used by a certain pirate captain, involves creating a giant spectral elephant. What is...?
questions.answer: Zou Zou no Mi, Model: Mammoth

questions.question: This captain of the Kid Pirates is known for his magnetic powers and rivalry with the Straw Hat Pirates' captain. Who is...?
This revolutionary is known for his crow zone ability and efforts to overthrow the World Government. Who is...?
This character, a princess of the Fish-Man Island, has the ability to communicate with sea kings. Who is...?
